If you're looking for a war-themed movie that will transport you back in time, I highly recommend "Tora! Tora! Tora!" (1970). This film is a classic and an intense portrayal of the events leading up to the surprise attack on Pearl Harbor. You'll be captivated by the impressive cast, including James Whitmore and Joseph Cotten.

If you'd like something more recent, "We Were Soldiers" (2002) is another great option. Directed by Randall Wallace, this movie tells a powerful story of courage and sacrifice during the Vietnam War. With Mel Gibson leading an all-star cast, it's an emotional and thought-provoking watch.
